column4: Good day all, just curious why snmptrapd refuses to recognise the disableAuthorization conf directive? and what the new variant for this function would be?
Good day all, just curious why snmptrapd refuses to recognise the disableAuthorization conf directive? and what the new variant for this function would be?  version 5.4.3 in precise
